name: ax-mulcl
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc))
comment: Closure law for multiplication of complex numbers. Axiom 6 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulcl . Proofs should normally use ~ mulcl instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
